trigger: No smoke alarm present in required location
action_item: Install a qualifying smoke alarm on each level of the home and outside sleeping areas, per program and code.
documentation: Photo of installed alarms, signed client notification, job file update.
policy_text: Working smoke alarms are required in all weatherized homes.

trigger: Missing or broken handrail on stairs
action_item: Install or repair handrail to code before proceeding with any interior weatherization or energy measures.
documentation: Photo of installed handrail, inspection note.
policy_text: Unsecured stairs pose a fall hazard and must be corrected for safety.

trigger: Client refuses required H&S measure (alarm, vent, safety device)
action_item: Document refusal with signed client waiver, notify supervisor, and retain in job file. Defer work if refusal creates unresolved hazard.
documentation: Signed waiver, notification log, supervisor note.
policy_text: Refusal of required health & safety work must be documented and escalated; deferral may apply.

action_item: Install guard or barrier per code before weatherization proceeds.
documentation: Photo of installed guard, inspection log.
policy_text: Open stairwells without guardrails are a fall risk and must be corrected.
